# Interface: ISignatureUnlock

An unlock holding one or more signatures unlocking one or more inputs..

## Hierarchy

- [`ITypeBase`](ITypeBase.md)<`0`\>

  ↳ **`ISignatureUnlock`**

The type of the object.
